Description

The Fifth Waffle is a small, indie game company created by three brothers who have a passion for game making and game playing. The team officially started working together on games during a local hackathon in 2016 where they took second place overall out of 56 teams for their game. Following this success, the team took GDC � Best in Game at the hackathon in 2017, 13th overall in the GM48 international Game Jam, and 1st place at a local Game Jam.
